title: Czech Central Bank Chief Says Policy Will Need to Remain Tight
description: The Czech central bank needs to maintain a tight monetary stance to keep inflation under control but is leaving all options open for interest rate decisions this year, according to Governor Ales Michl.
content: The Czech central bank needs to maintain a tight monetary stance to keep inflation under control but is leaving all options open for interest rate decisions this year, according to Governor Ales Michl.
